Purpose: To analyze CSF for CJD-associated markers (14-3-3 protein, tau protein, RT-QuIC) to aid in the diagnosis of Creutzfeldt-Jakob Disease.
Equipment: Centrifuge; pipettes; CSF testing kits (14-3-3 Western blot, tau ELISA, RT-QuIC); ELISA/Western blot apparatus; real-time PCR machine; refrigerated storage; laboratory computer system
